Reviews.Title: “Close to the airport”
Reviews.Author: Mick W
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 2 nights and found the hotel a little skimpy on the finer details. The rooms were priced similar in range to locations in Madrid with more facilities and better bars and restaurants. It was difficult to get an iron and to one they gave me kept tripping the electricity. Not an exciting event when one is in the shower and the place becomes completely dark! The room was decorated with minimal expense, the bathroom floor was green laminated timber and one almost had to climb over the bidet to enter the shower. The staff were very pleasant and spoke good English. Although hotel bar was quite limited, the location is well positioned to a couple of lively spots offering traditional Spanish food and drink. One word of advice when getting to the hotel – beware the taxi drivers!! Myself and some of my companions were over charged by drivers who were keen to make more than a few euro’s extra from our party. Overall the room was comfortable and quiet and it was easy to access the centre of Madrid for Business. It would make a good base for city visitors. I would recommend a stay here for business or pleasure.

Reviews.Title: “Budget hotel near Madrid airport”
Reviews.Author: John S
Reviews.Content: Good budget hotel near Barajas airport, Madrid. Reasonably priced rooms are clean and comfortable. Free shuttle bus to airport is very useful. Hotel is near a Metro station that takes you direct to Puerta del Sol. WiFi in lobby is free . Faster WiFi you pay for. I have stayed here most weeks since January and always got a reservation.

Reviews.Title: “Decent airport hotel”
Reviews.Author: EAWhitley1
Reviews.Content: Perfectly fine hotel if you need to do an overnight stay for Madrid airport. My flight was delayed and so I'd missed the free shuttle to the hotel- a taxi from T4 cost about €30 The breakfast selection is good and tasty

Reviews.Title: “Standard airport hotel fare”
Reviews.Author: ACF2010
Reviews.Content: Not really much to say - room was clean and modern but lacked certain amenities - razor plug, bathtub, minibar, coffee/tea apparatus and I still find having to pay EUR 10 for 24 hours of Internet appalling - especially one that targets travellers looking for convenience! Bed was comfy though and not too much noise in the surrounding neighbourhood. A range of neighbourhood dining options around the hotel. The hotel shuttle is useful, especially from hotel to airport but more complicated vice versa as requires pre-booking, would be better to have an appointed time at the hotel every 30 minutes.

Reviews.Title: “Real disappointment for an NH”
Reviews.Author: CheshireLady
Reviews.Content: On a positive note, the bed was comfortable and it was reasonably quite. The hotel shuttle to the airport was good also. Apart from that, I struggle to find any positives, no room service, the restaurant dinner was very poor, breakfast did not start until 7am (I know it's Spain, but it's an 'airport hotel'. The wifi was chargeable, very unusual for a Spanish hotel. Finally the room cleanliness and condition was well past its best. Would suggest you look at other options as its certainly no business hotel.

Reviews.Title: “No free wi-fi but good sleep quality”
Reviews.Author: Viviana O
Reviews.Content: The location wasn't that good but if I come back I would stay here again. It's in a very quite neighborhood and they offer free ride to the airport. The room was very comfortable, nice bathroom and TV. Great staff as well. I liked it very much.

Reviews.Title: “Close to aiport, inexpensive, clean”
Reviews.Author: Posted by a NH Hoteles traveler
Reviews.Content: A nice hotel close to airport, the rooms are small but clean and well appointed. The TV was a bit small, about 22 inch. We chose the hotel because of the location and the affiliation; NH hotels have been a positive experience. No need to pay the expensive parking rate, you can park along the street next to the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Good for short stay”
Reviews.Author: Marcelo R
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 4 days and decided to stay close to airport as we were having a very early fly (7am) It is very close to metro station that takes you in 20 minutes to downtown, nothing else around, far away walking distance to everyware except metro and park. We took a triple room, it was the smallest room I ever had in my life. Breakfast not included, In-Out transfers included and convenient.

Reviews.Title: “Although the location is good, take a pass on this one”
Reviews.Author: Born-on-Rt66
Reviews.Content: First experience was the difficulty in finding the front door. Not a friendly welcome. The front desk staff was adequate although not terribly friendly. The hallways and elevators had an institutional feel. The room had the required components but was not welcoming. Internet was unreasonably expensive but you could have very slow connection in the lobby in 30 minute increments. So slow that you could do next to nothing prior to needing a new code. The food was overpriced and substandard. Don't opt for the breakfast, not worth the money. Probably should just opt to eat elsewhere for all meals.

Reviews.Title: “Never Again!”
Reviews.Author: HamlynTenerife
Reviews.Content: There was no phone number at the airport - taxi cost 20euros. No glasses in the bar - eventually my husbands beer appeared in a wine glass!Barman did his best but had not been trained. Room was so close to the wall my husband (6ft.2 and 12stone) had to get into bed sideways. Very, very basic.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel outside of city center.”
Reviews.Author: 30_by_thirty
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the NH Barajas for 2 nights while traveling with a large group of high school students. The rooms in the hotel were clean and comfortable. Free wi-fi is available in the lobby of the hotel upon getting a code from the front desk. The breakfast at this hotel was fantastic. They offered an incredibly wide assortment of food and drinks that provided a great start to the day. The staff here was also friendly and helpful. The hotel is not in city center, however it is situated near a metro stop which allowed us easy access to the city. The ride on the metro was approximately 25 minutes. If you prefer to be within walking distance of the city, this is not the hotel for you. If you don’t mind the commute, the clean, comfortable and affordable NH Barajas is the right place for you.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money..”
Reviews.Author: sjainuk
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very conveniently located near the airport. The hotel is very prompt in arranging for a pick-up once you reach the airport - you need to call them; The hotel is clean and tidy. The staff was very polite and helpful. The breakfast spread was good. If you dont take the breakfast option while booking your hotel, opt for it during the checkin time. They you a discount of 20% for opting the breakfast, while doing the check-in. The hotel is great value for money.. Definitely recommended if you are looking for an accommodation near the airport flying in / out of madrid

Reviews.Title: “Good Location outside Madrid w/ Metro nearby, Quiet Neighborhood”
Reviews.Author: Kalax-ta
Reviews.Content: Good: - Good Breakfast, Comfortable bed; - 100m away from El Capricho Metro Station (30min from Centre of Madrid - no need to change lines); - Quiet and safe neighborhood - if you come by car just park somewhere else free; - Near the airport (although we didn't use the airport) and with free shuttle; - Near Plenilunio shopping center and Highway M-30; Not so good: - Over heated room, and with no chance to lower the temperature! (only the heating was working); - The hotel has two separate buildings with no chance of crossing avoiding bad weather (rain, wind);

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel and best front manager”
Reviews.Author: monel
Reviews.Content: Me and my wife chose this hotel for the N.H. good reputation and not far from airport. Before arriving we got all the information we need from the front manager , Miss Cristina Ramírez, and 10 minutes after landing she send the free shuttle to take us to hotel, give us a nice room and resolve all our problems. After 1 week we decided to stay again in this hotel. The flight arrived at 10 p.m. and this time also Miss Ramírez send the shuttle after 10 minutes we called hotel and again got a nice room. The metro is 5 minutes walking from hotel and in 20 minutes you are in Madrid center. The rate was 49 euro include breakfast. Certainly, we will come back to this hotel the next our visit in Madrid Monel-Israel

Reviews.Title: “Madrid Airport Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Leinsterlion
Reviews.Content: I booked a twin at the non-refundable discounted rate which included breakfast which is the best rate you can book online.On arrival at Barajas I asked the information desk to phone for the courtesy bus which arrived about 20 minutes later taking me back to the hotel which is based in a suburb of Madrid(even though it was a 10min drive-there was no aircraft noise at the hotel).I was under the impression that to get into Madrid I would have to take the courtesy bus back to the airport to catch the Metro but I was pleasantly surprised when the hotel advised that 200m away was the Metro station 'El Capricho' which meant very easy access into the City.The Metro system in Madrid was clean,efficient and very good value.Also by the hotel was a nice selection of local bars one of which served local delicacies.In addition the hotel was very clean,rthe staff attentive and the continental breakfast offered plenty of choice.

Reviews.Title: “Clean but costly”
Reviews.Author: spanishfly58
Reviews.Content: First hotel we found coming into Madrid by ring road from Valencia(confusing signs to airport.)From outside ,the building resembles a prison (inside is a bit better) and has 2 buildings linked by a courtyard. Hotel has an underground car park,secure, 12 euros a day and as we were going away on a cruise for a week the following day ,decided to leave the car there for the duration and take the free shuttle bus to airport.Enquired to stay for a night on our return,but the price of a room suddenly increased to 157 euros so decided against that and just booked for overnight and the car park. Nice reception staff and our room was well designed for a small room, comfortable bed , and very clean. Even though there was a road outside there was little noise.Unfortunately there was nothing opened in the hotel for a drink or food ,as it was a weekend ,so had to find refreshment in one of the adjoining streets which had a couple of restaurants and a bar.More expense. Breakfast was the normal continental and cold hard boiled eggs. The service was professional and the airport shuttle was on time. On our late return the following Sunday the reception was open and we collected the car and drove home. I am sure there are better options for a cheaper hotel if you know the area but we only wanted a place for the night,near to the airport and most of the hotels in that area know that and can command a good price. Warning, the taxi back to the hotel from Barajas charged us 26 euros which is very expensive for a less than 5 kms journey.!

HotelInfo.Name: NH Barajas
HotelInfo.Address: Calle de Catamaran 1, 28042 Madrid, Spain (Formerly NH Express Barajas)
